snippet: That total made Super Bowl XLVI the "most-watched single-game sports event ever online," the network said.
abstract: That total made Super Bowl XLVI the "most-watched single-game sports event ever online," the network said.
lead_paragraph: More than 2.1 million people turned on the live Internet stream of Super Bowl XLVI on Sunday night, NBC said on Tuesday, citing data from two measurement firms, Omniture and mDialog.

headline.main: 2.1 Million Streamed the Super Bowl, NBC Says
